item.title: Steve Witkoff Is a Master of Confusion
item.description: Trump’s special envoy to seemingly every international front is undermining U.S. foreign policy.

item.title: The Eternal City Abides
item.description: Francis Marion Crawford’s work reminds us of the history and the greatness of Rome.

item.title: Wokeness in Medicine Hasn’t Been Cured Yet
item.description: The same people and institutions who have spent years degrading the practice of medicine in service of their ideological goals are still at it.

item.title: The Great Easter Speech That Never Happens
item.description: The gospels seem to be setting up a courtroom drama for Jesus to defend Himself. Why doesn’t He do it?

item.title: Yes, There Is a Left-Wing Violence Problem in This Country
item.description: Ignoring it won’t make it go away.
